introduction: Kilo Code is the premiere autonomous coding agent. Get ready to architect, code, debug, and boost your productivity like you've never seen before. To continue, Kilo Code requires an API key.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.

roo.description: The best free models to get started

chooseProvider: To do its magic, Kilo Code needs an API key.

landing.introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, Roo Code lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
landing.accountMention: To get started, create your Roo Code Cloud account. Get powerful models, web control, analytics, support and more.

providerSignup.heading: Choose your provider
providerSignup.chooseProvider: Roo needs an LLM provider to work. Choose one to get started, you can add more later.
providerSignup.rooCloudDescription: The easiest way to start is with the Roo Code Router: a curated mix of free and paid models at a low cost.
providerSignup.useAnotherProviderDescription: Enter an API key and get going.
providerSignup.noApiKeys: Don't want to deal with API keys and separate accounts?
providerSignup.backToRoo: Go with the Roo Code Router.

waitingForCloud.heading: Logging into Roo Code Cloud...
waitingForCloud.description: We'll take you to your browser to sign up for Roo Code Cloud. We'll then bring you back here to finish.
waitingForCloud.noPrompt: If you don't get prompted to open a URL, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.havingTrouble: If you've completed sign up but are having trouble, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.pasteUrl: Paste the callback URL shown in your browser:
waitingForCloud.invalidURL: That doesn't look like a valid callback URL. Please copy what Roo Code Cloud is showing in your browser.

startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: Kilo Code collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.

noFolderNoHistory.heading: Welcome to Kilo Code!
noFolderNoHistory.description: To get started, open a folder or clone a repository. Or try out Kilo Code with a fun project!

folderNoHistory.heading: Let's get started with your project!
folderNoHistory.description: Here are some things I can help you with:

prompts.explainStructure: Explain the structure of this project
prompts.findBugs: Find potential bugs in the current file
prompts.writeTests: Write tests for the selected code

withSubscription.heading: This model requires a subscription
withSubscription.description: Subscribe to Kilo Code Gateway to get access to premium models with flexible pricing.
withSubscription.useOwnKey: or use your own API key

withoutSubscription.heading: This model requires an API key
withoutSubscription.description: This model doesn't support Kilo Gateway subscriptions. You'll need to configure your own API key.
withoutSubscription.orCreateAccount: or create a Kilo account for other models

rateLimit.heading: You've reached your free usage limit
rateLimit.description: Create a Kilo Code account to continue using free models, or wait for your limit to reset.
rateLimit.waitTime: Your limit will reset in {{minutes}} minutes
